title: Who raps in the Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles new theme song? - Quora

response.answer_text: The soundtrack was composed by Dennis Challen Brown (credited as "D.C. Brown" and later as "Dennis C. Brown") and Chuck Lorre. Lorre recorded the theme song (and did the spoken parts) and became a successful television producer. The performer of the song was James Mandell (aka Miles Doppler). For more information, why not try Wikipedia? https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Teenage_Mutant_Ninja_Turtles_%281987_TV_series%29
Sebastian Evans - IMDb wrote the theme for the 2012-2017 series.
